List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.
limit

Number of events to list.
from

Where to start the list, for pagination.
object

Object to summarize.
...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.
x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()

#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package  Version Title                                              
#>  + 5 hours mixsmsn  1.1-8   Fitting Finite Mixture of Scale Mixture of Skew-...
#>  + 5 hours brms     2.14.0  Bayesian Regression Models using 'Stan'            
#>  + 5 hours clipr    0.7.1   Read and Write from the System Clipboard           
#>  + 5 hours waldo    0.2.1   Find Differences Between R Objects                 
#>  + 6 hours gratis   0.2.1   Generating Time Series with Diverse and Controll...
#>  + 6 hours treeclim 2.0.5.1 Numerical Calibration of Proxy-Climate Relations...
#>  + 6 hours prim     1.0.19  Patient Rule Induction Method (PRIM)               
#>  + 7 hours omicwas  0.8.0   Cell-Type-Specific Association Testing in Bulk O...
#>  + 7 hours GALLO    1.0     Genomic Annotation in Livestock for Positional C...
#>  + 7 hours gglm     0.1.0   Grammar of Graphics for Linear Model Diagnostic ...
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package      Version Title                                         
#>  - 12 hours MissMech     1.0.2   Testing Homoscedasticity, Multivariate Norm...
#>  - 12 hours CryptRndTest 1.2.2   Statistical Tests for Cryptographic Randomn...
#>  - 13 hours irt          0.1.1   Item Response Theory and Computerized Adapt...
#>  - 1 day    genBart      1.0.1   Generate 'BART' File                          
#>  - 1 day    icesTAF      3.5-0   Functions to Support the ICES Transparent A...
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package Version Title                                               
#>  + 5 hours mixsmsn 1.1-8   Fitting Finite Mixture of Scale Mixture of Skew-N...
#>  + 5 hours brms    2.14.0  Bayesian Regression Models using 'Stan'             
#>  + 5 hours clipr   0.7.1   Read and Write from the System Clipboard            
#>  + 5 hours waldo   0.2.1   Find Differences Between R Objects                  
#>  + 6 hours gratis  0.2.1   Generating Time Series with Diverse and Controlla...
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))

#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "mixsmsn@1.1-8"    "brms@2.14.0"      "clipr@0.7.1"      "waldo@0.2.1"     
#>  [5] "gratis@0.2.1"     "treeclim@2.0.5.1" "prim@1.0.19"      "omicwas@0.8.0"   
#>  [9] "GALLO@1.0"        "gglm@0.1.0"
